Key Features Ultra Slim Design with 6mm ThicknessAutomatically Enters Night Mode with Lowest Brightness and Shows Only CalendarBuilt-in Ambient Light SensorOnly 3 W Power Consumption Even if Put on for 24 hrs Life is full of small moments of joy that you try and capture so that you can sit back at a later date and recall how happy those little doses made you. This is one of the reasons that photographs are possessions which are cherished deeply by one and all, because they take them back in time to the moment when they were at their happiest and having the most fun. Even though the value attached to them remains unchanged, from physical prints to digital copies that take up very little space and last longer, photos have come a long way. Framed graduation photos used to be the pride and joy of every household but the need for space and fast pace of lifestyle leaves little time to go into all that trouble to cherish and display such photos.

details.name: Giorgio Armani Attitude Eau de Toilette - 75 ml (For Men)
details.description: Giorgio Armani Attitude Eau de Toilette - 75 ml (For Men) Price: Rs.3840 An unusual composition of elements make this luxury scent stand apart with its distinct smell and impeccable style. For the man who makes a mark with every move and every word, Giorgio Armani Attitude complements his personality. Embodying refined composure and a firm manner, he walks confidently, unshaken by all the chaos around. Created with the combined efforts of Alberto Morillas, Annick Menardo and Olivier Cresp, this Eau de Toilette is crafted for the sophisticated house of Armani. The top note mesmerises you with an interesting blend of fresh lemon with aromatic notes of coffee trailing into the heart note that brings you floral lavender along with green hints of cardamom. Finishing off this scent is the base note redolent with warm notes of cedar, earthy patchouli, smoky amber and resinous hints of opopanax. The warm and spicy accords of this oriental woody fragrance is perfect to wear for your special night. An entrancing fragrance, it comes in an innovative and attention-grabbing bottle in the shape of a cigarette lighter. Flaunting a rectangular frame painted jet-black with an elegant horizontal diamante pattern, the silver top comes in the shape of a clicker. Exuding a rich and smooth aroma, this fragrance makes a bold statement with its intensely masculine appeal.

details.name: Tommy Hilfiger Kelsey Analog Watch - For Women (Rose Gold)
details.description: Tommy Hilfiger Kelsey Analog Watch - For Women (Rose Gold) Price: Rs.5947 Key Features Water ResistantRose Gold StrapPush Button ClaspRound DialStainless Steel Case The Kelsey series of Tommy Hilfiger caters to individuals who like their accessories to be designed with a little bit of that old world charm. Watches back then were more of a status symbol and prided family heirloom than a functional utility, and that is just what Tommy Hilfiger has managed to conjure up with their elitist Kelsey line. Because of this, the extremely classy Tommy Hilfiger Analog Watch for women undoubtedly makes for a great gift and must have addition to your already prized collection of refined timepieces. The quartz timepiece will surely make a lasting impression in your heart with its chic functionalities. Body and Design The Kelsey series analog watch is designed around a rose-gold ion-plated case. The stainless steel case, apart from protecting everything that is vital to the watchs functioning, is brilliantly accentuated by the attractive colour of dial. The round dial makes use of bold and vivid index hour markers to add to the wristwatchs unmistaken charm and feel. The Tommy Hilfiger womens analog wristwatch makes use of a stainless steel strap to help securely fasten the timepiece to your wrist. Adding to the straps alluring appeal is the rose gold ion-plating that enhances your charm. Furthermore, a push button clasp adds to your comfort by allowing you to take the timepiece off by simply pressing a button. When talking about the body and design of such an exquisite wristwatch, it isnt hard to see that the sum of its high quality and well-designed parts far exceeds its whole. Functions and Other Features If you often find yourself covering for shelter every time it rains or drizzles when you are on your way back home from work, the water-resistant feature of the womens analog Kelsey series Tommy Hilfiger wristwatch makes for one less accessory that you should worry about ruining under those unforeseeable circumstances. On sunnier and hotter days when getting completely soaked seems like the only possible way you could cool off, the 30 m water-resistant feature of the womens Tommy Hilfiger watch equips you to beat the scorching heat by diving into that nearest swimming pool. So with the Tommy Hilfiger analog wristwatch for women, you really do get an accessory that makes an exclamation of a difference and having that in your arsenal of power dressing attire, is surely worth it.

details.name: Titan Raga Analog Watch - For Women (Brass)
details.description: Gift your special friend/sister/colleague on her marriage, this beautiful and elegant watch from Titan Raga.Titan Raga Analog Watch - For Women (Brass) Price: Rs.9500 Key Features Contemporary DialBrass StrapBrass CaseWater Resistant Ever wished to be able to stand out in a crowd, be the subject of everyones attention and dazzle your way through everywhere you go. Then its time to step into the light with this enchanting and almost spellbinding timepiece belonging to the Raga series of designer womens watches from the house of Titan. Body & Design This artistically crafted watch sports a contemporary dial design that resembles a tear drop with an extensive amount of stone work that surrounds it. This dial has a watch face that carries a light background with a sufficiently visible honeycomb pattern to top it off. Since this watch does not feature a seconds ticker, there are only two hands on the watch face, which along with the four main digit markers are given a gleaming metallic finish to match the rest of the watch. This all-important dial has a considerably thick circle of protection in the form of a sturdy brass case. This bezel that surrounds the dials glass cover is given the full treatment with a galaxy of crystals that is sure to overwhelm you with its brilliance. The time can be adjusted or changed with the easily operation of the watchs rotating crown which is placed on the right of the dial. The dial is kept firmly and safely fastened to your wrist with a sleek, slender and immensely graceful solid links strap which is made to effortlessly to blend with the rest of the watch. The combination of a perfectly built brass case and a well moulded clear glass cover gives this watch the ability to function normally up to a maximum depth of 30 m. With such sophistication and elegance this absolute marvel of a timepiece from Titans Raga series makes more of an artefact than just a personal time keeper.
